author: Thang Tran
comment: 5 stars, however: 1) The duration for vibration is too short and weak that I didn't realize it. 2) The app should have the function: not vibrating during a specific period - for example from 1: AM to 7: AM 3) It works for only 2 hours and then stop.
title: Need more function

author: Matt Morrison
comment: Use this to keep a running timer for conducting rounds at work. Only think I'd like would be being able to set specific times. My rounds are anywhere from every 4 minutes to every 30 depending on where I'm working. Please consider adding this feature as other interval timers have it but don't vibrate long enough for my preferences.
title: Almost there

author: Beatrice Gatta
comment: As stated by other users, if you ever think of adding some functions, please start from: custom times, custom vibration intensity, length and pattern, and specific days or time of day to automatically run and stop the app. Will gladly pay for the new functions. Thank you!
title: Nice

author: Craig Newmark
comment: ... is there a way to specify the interval, or otherwise set it for thirty minutes? thanks!
title: really useful, good, but ...

author: Jose Magararu
comment: Def useful for long drives...and now it's perfect on my Moto 360!!!
title: Great idea!!!

author: Kristoph Smith
comment: As soon as I saw this, I thought it was a load of crap. But I was wrong. Give it a go :)
title: It actually works

author: Kaylee Fabela
comment: This is such a great idea for long distance / overnight driving!
title: Great app!

author: kiddo
comment: I'm not sure if my watch has a speaker. If it does can you make it say something like "keep your eyes on the road"

reply.author: Paul Trebilcox-Ruiz
reply.content: Sadly the current set that's out don't have speakers, but if any do come out I'll definitely add that feature. I'm guessing you were able to get the app onto your watch then? I had been having a problem with getting the Wear part installed on my watch from the mobile app, but if it worked for you then that's _awesome_ :)

title: Very cool concept.
